title: Generated-the-power-of-ai-chats-L4i8R2F3g6J4i7r
prompt:
Generate a list of highly relevant main keywords and related keywords based on the topic defined by [[TOPIC]] in [[LANG]] language with tone [[TONE]].
            Main Keywords MUST BE 2 high-impact phrases and each NO LONGER than 6 WORDS, directly tied to the topic. 
            Related keywords MUST BE 2 supporting phrases that reflect long-tail, specific search intent and related subtopics. 
            Finally, the output should be structured as JSON with the following format and number of main_keywords item MUST be 2 and number of related_keywords item MUST be 2 : [[RESPONSE_FORMAT]]. 
            Ensure all keywords are relevant, suitable for article optimization, and aligned with current SEO trends.

            [[TOPIC]]
            The Power of AI Chats

            [[LANG]]
            English

            [[TONE]]
            Select

            [[RESPONSE_FORMAT]]
            {
                "main_keywords": ["Main Key 1", "Main Key 2"],
                "related_keywords": ["Related Key 1", "Related Key 2"]
            }
